title: Why didn't I get free promo win?
body: I got to my gold 5 promos. And I lost them and after I lost them I got a message that popped up on my screen that said I would get a free win next time I got to these promos. So I just got back to them around 2 weeks later I lost the first one, and I didn't get a free win? Why is that? Can someone please explain to me please. Thanks.

replies.body:
When you are demoted out of the tier/division you were in when you got the promo helper, it resets the promo helper, and you won't regain it until you lose the series again. 

For complete details check out [this FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.
